title: [$125] Increase HitSlop on checkboxes

labels.name: Reviewing
labels.description: Has a PR in review

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Weekly
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
Coming from: https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C03U7DCU4/p1768001018554839 ### Problem When clicking on checkboxes, for example, on the category list to bulk-delete categories, I'm finding it really easy to accidentally miss the checkbox and open the category details by mistake. ### Solution Increase the HitSlop on the checkbox to prettymuch take up all the space to left of the category name. If you wanted to click on the row, you'd not be clicking so near the checkbox.

body:
If you haven‚Äôt already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.97-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/78410 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** ibellicotest+2250@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Exploratory - Significant User Experience Deterioration **Device used:** Motorola MotoG60 / Android 12 (Hybrid app) - Windows 11 / Chrome **App Component:** Search ## Action Performed: Prerequisite: Account has at least one workspace. 1. Open the Expensify app. 2. Open any workspace chat. 3. Create a manual expense with date from last month. 4. Navigate to "Reports" > "Top Spenders" 5. Expand the results. 6. Long tap and select the just created expense. 7. Tap on dropdown menu and select "Hold" 8. Enter any reason and hold the expense. 9. Note that after expense is held, no message is visible on expense preview. 10. Open the expense. 11. Note that expense is correctly held. 12. Return to "Top Spenders" 13. Note that violation message is still not visible. ## Expected Result: Violations should be visible on preview of expenses while on "Top Spenders" section. ## Actual Result: After holding an expense while on "Top Spenders" section, no violation message appears on preview. Same behaviour is experienced in "Unapproved Cash" section. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/99ee700f-1ce6-4d2a-824c-57750719f218 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

## Overview This issue tracks elements that need accessibility labels added or updated to include meaningful information for screen reader users. ## Context Part of the accessibility improvement effort tracked in https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/575078 ## Issues to Fix - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77454 - Participant buttons don't announce remove purpose *(add "Remove [name]" to label)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77412 - Chat messages announced as 'chat message' *(include sender, time, message text)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77369 - Amount field doesn't announce currency *(include currency in label)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77365 - Status button announced without selected emoji *(dynamically include emoji or "not selected")* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77363 - 'Scan receipt' announced with redundant 'floating action' *(remove redundant text)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76906 - Switch button announced with incorrect name *(update aria-label to match visible label)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76905 - Step buttons not conveyed *(update aria-label to "Step 1", "Step 2", etc.)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74877 - Various buttons announce only option *(include visible name with value)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74868 - Distance field has no programmatic name *(add "distance (mi)" label)* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74855 - Language combobox has no programmatic name *(add aria-label "Language selection")* - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74853 - Social media links have no accessible names *(add aria-label for each: Twitter, Instagram, etc.)* ## Instructions **Suggested Fix:** Add or update accessibilityLabel to include meaningful information > **Note:** Discuss on Slack if you are unsure whether a sub-issue should be fixed or if you are unsure about the right fix / expected result. Ideally, create a single PR that will fix all the issues listed to minimize review time (more PRs only if necessary).

labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
## Overview This issue tracks focus management problems where focus is lost, incorrectly placed, or moves unexpectedly. ## Context Part of the accessibility improvement effort tracked in https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/575078 ## Issues to Fix - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77552 - Invisible dates from prev/next month are focused - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77494 - Incorrect focus movement after requesting OTP - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77491 - Focus not returned to triggering element - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77458 - Focus resets to Back button when focusing OTP cell - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77411 - Focus lost when returning to previous screen - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77370 - Incorrect initial focus when opening screen - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77337 - Focus not moved when activating 'fix errors' link - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76955 - Adjacent checkbox/button performs same action - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76937 - Non-interactive texts focused with Tab ## Instructions **Suggested Fix:** Implement focus management / Fix focus management > **Note:** Discuss on Slack if you are unsure whether a sub-issue should be fixed or if you are unsure about the right fix / expected result. Ideally, create a single PR that will fix all the issues listed to minimize review time (more PRs only if necessary).

labels.name: Bug

body:
## Overview This issue tracks elements that need to be made focusable for keyboard and screen reader accessibility. ## Context Part of the accessibility improvement effort tracked in https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/575078 ## Issues to Fix - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77555 - Social network links not focused and announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77548 - Button to copy email not focused and announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77543 - Licenses link not focused and announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77471 - 3-dot More button not focusable - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77387 - QR code image not focused and announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77331 - Progress bar not focused and announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77251 - Logo image not focused and announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76070 - Submit a bug button not focusable - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74884 - QR code not focused and announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74872 - Licenses link not focusable with Tab key ## Instructions **Suggested Fix:** Make element focusable with props > **Note:** Discuss on Slack if you are unsure whether a sub-issue should be fixed or if you are unsure about the right fix / expected result. Ideally, create a single PR that will fix all the issues listed to minimize review time (more PRs only if necessary).

title: [$500][Accessibility][Tracking] Live Region / Status Announcements

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
## Overview This issue tracks live region and status announcement accessibility problems. Add live region for errors/status/suggestions so screen readers can announce dynamic content changes. ## Context Part of the accessibility improvement effort tracked in https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/575078 ## Issues to Fix - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77572 - Error message is not announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77257 - Updated error message not announced during typing - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77256 - Informative icon before error message not announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77422 - Status message of no results not announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77390 - Availability of search suggestions not announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76958 - Status message of no results not announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76939 - Error message not associated with field - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76928 - Status messages not announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74866 - Error messages not announced once they appear - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/74840 - Availability of search suggestions not announced - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77490 - No announcement after selecting emoji category - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/76948 - No information of context menu - https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/77259 - User not informed about displayed timer countdown ## Instructions **Suggested Fix:** Add live region for errors/status/suggestions > **Note:** Discuss on Slack if you are unsure whether a sub-issue should be fixed or if you are unsure about the right fix / expected result. Ideally, create a single PR that will fix all the issues listed to minimize review time (more PRs only if necessary).
